docs.lead_paragraph: Manufacturers are designing cigarettes to deliver more nicotine to the lungs. That devious tactic requires a strong response by regulators.
docs.abstract: Editorial expresses alarm at journal Nicotine and Tobacco Research report that changes in cigarette design have increased the efficiency of delivering nicotine to smokers' lungs, putting them today at greater risk for diseases than smokers in 1964; urges regulators to block designs, ingredients and marketing strategies that increase the amount of nicotine taken in by smokers.
docs.snippet: Manufacturers are designing cigarettes to deliver more nicotine to the lungs. That devious tactic requires a strong response by regulators.

docs.abstract: Doctrinal revision needn’t contradict his commitment to the “value of the human person.”
docs.snippet: Doctrinal revision needn’t contradict his commitment to the “value of the human person.”

docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas paramedic will ask a Fort Worth court on Friday to remove his pregnant wife from life support, saying the fetus she is forced to carry under state law has become severely damaged in her debilitated body.

headline.main: Texas Man to Ask Court to Remove Pregnant Wife From Life Support
headline.print_headline: Texas Man to Ask Court to Remove Pregnant Wife From Life Support

docs.snippet: A Texas paramedic will ask a Fort Worth court on Friday to remove his pregnant wife from life support, saying the fetus she is forced to carry under state law has become severely damaged in her debilitated body.

docs.lead_paragraph: A dozen men whose biological children were placed for adoption in Utah without their consent have sued the state in federal court, claiming its tangled network of rules unconstitutionally strip them of their parental rights.

headline.main: Biological Fathers Sue Utah Over State Adoption Laws
headline.print_headline: Biological Fathers Sue Utah Over State Adoption Laws

docs.snippet: A dozen men whose biological children were placed for adoption in Utah without their consent have sued the state in federal court, claiming its tangled network of rules unconstitutionally strip them of their parental rights.

headline.main: A Pregnant Teenager, Still Hopeful Against Long Odds

docs.abstract: A video profile of a teenage mother-to-be in rural Missouri highlights the challenges one young woman will face in not following in her own mother’s footsteps.
docs.snippet: A video profile of a teenage mother-to-be in rural Missouri highlights the challenges one young woman will face in not following in her own mother’s footsteps.

headline.main: Our Bodies, Our Apps: For the Love of Period-Trackers
headline.print_headline: Track Your Period Using an App

docs.abstract: Period-tracking apps are the latest entry in the trendy quantitative self and health movement.
docs.snippet: Period-tracking apps are the latest entry in the trendy quantitative self and health movement.

docs.lead_paragraph: The next ‘neglected topic’ suggested by you loyal readers is family breakdown and the rise of single-parent households.
docs.abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column submits that family breakdown and rise of single parenthood is one of 2014's most important but most delicate topics; holds issue is linked directly to that of poverty, but that both conservatives and liberals have fallen short in their assessments of how to address problem; lists several tactics that could both strengthen families and reduce poverty.
docs.snippet: The next ‘neglected topic’ suggested by you loyal readers is family breakdown and the rise of single-parent households.

docs.lead_paragraph: If lofty intentions, determination and hard work were all it took to make a successful movie, then "Gimme Shelter," a film about teen pregnancy starring former Disney star Vanessa Hudgens, would have it made.

headline.print_headline: Review: Bold Hudgens but Flat Script in 'Shelter'

docs.lead_paragraph: Opponents who have chipped away at abortion with state-level restrictions are facing a dilemma in some of the places where they have been most successful: Do they continue with that approach or seek more dramatic policies that risk court rulings that could undo previous gains?

headline.main: State Victories Create Dilemma for Abortion Foes
headline.print_headline: State Victories Create Dilemma for Abortion Foes
